eventLocationSelectWarning: Select the event you want to see the location of.
eventSelectYourLocation: Please select your location by clicking on the map.
deleteMyRegistrationInfo: You are about to cancel your participation. Are you sure you want to leave the event?
selectChatGroup: Select the event you want to chat about
deleteEvent: You Are About to Delete the Event
deleteEventInfo: Once you delete the event, all participant registrations will be canceled, and they will receive an email notification informing them that the event has been canceled. This action cannot be undone.
emailVerificationInfo: Enter the 6-digit verification code sent to you to verify your email account. This code is valid for a limited time. Complete the process before the code expires to successfully verify your account.
